verses.verse: Now it came<WH1961> about in the seventh<WH7637> month<WH2320> that Ishmael<WH3458> the son<WH1121> of Nethaniah,<WH5418> the son<WH1121> of Elishama,<WH476> of the royal<WH4410> family<WH2233> and [one] of the chief<WH9538> officers<WH9538> of the king,<WH4428> along with ten<WH6235> men,<WH376> came<WH935> to Mizpah<WH4709> to Gedaliah<WH9072> the son<WH1121> of Ahikam.<WH296> While they were eating<WH398> bread<WH3899> together<WH9191> there<WH8033> in Mizpah,<WH4709>

Ishmael<WH3458> the son<WH1121> of Nethaniah<WH5418> and the ten<WH6235> men<WH376> who<WH834> were with him arose<WH6965> and struck<WH5221> down<WH5221> Gedaliah<WH9072> the son<WH1121> of Ahikam,<WH296> the son<WH1121> of Shaphan,<WH8227> with the sword<WH2719> and put<WH4191> to death<WH4191> the one whom<WH834> the king<WH4428> of Babylon<WH894> had appointed<WH6485> over the land.<WH776>

Ishmael<WH3458> also struck<WH5221> down<WH5221> all<WH3605> the Jews<WH3064> who<WH834> were with him, [that is] with Gedaliah<WH9072> at Mizpah,<WH4709> and the Chaldeans<WH3778> who<WH834> were found<WH4672> there,<WH8033> the men<WH376> of war.<WH4421>
Now it happened<WH1961> on the next<WH8145> day<WH3117> after the killing<WH4191> of Gedaliah,<WH9072> when no<WH3808> one<WH376> knew<WH3045> about [it,]

that eighty<WH8084> men<WH376> came<WH935> from Shechem,<WH7927> from Shiloh,<WH7887> and from Samaria<WH8111> with their beards<WH2206> shaved<WH1548> off<WH1548> and their clothes<WH899> torn<WH7167> and their bodies gashed,<WH1413> having grain offerings<WH4503> and incense<WH3828> in their hands<WH3027> to bring<WH935> to the house<WH1004> of the Lord.<WH3068>

Then Ishmael<WH3458> the son<WH1121> of Nethaniah<WH5418> went<WH3318> out from Mizpah<WH4709> to meet<WH7122> them, weeping<WH1058> as he went;<WH1980> and it came<WH1961> about as he met<WH6298> them that he said<WH559> to them, "Come<WH935> to Gedaliah<WH9072> the son<WH1121> of Ahikam!<WH296>"

Yet it turned<WH1961> out that as soon as they came<WH935> inside<WH8432> the city,<WH5892> Ishmael<WH3458> the son<WH1121> of Nethaniah<WH5418> and the men<WH376> that were with him slaughtered<WH7819> them, [and cast them] into the cistern.<WH953>

But ten<WH6235> men<WH376> who were found<WH4672> among them said<WH559> to Ishmael,<WH3458> "Do not put<WH4191> us to death;<WH4191> for we have<WH3426> stores<WH4301> of wheat,<WH2406> barley,<WH8184> oil<WH8081> and honey<WH1706> hidden<WH4301> in the field.<WH7704>" So he refrained<WH2308> and did not put<WH4191> them to death<WH4191> along<WH8432> with their companions.<WH251>

Now as for the cistern<WH953> where<WH834> <WH8033> Ishmael<WH3458> had cast<WH7993> all<WH3605> the corpses<WH6297> of the men<WH376> whom<WH834> he had struck<WH5221> down<WH5221> because<WH3027> of Gedaliah,<WH9072> it was the one that King<WH4428> Asa<WH609> had made<WH6213> on account<WH4480> <WH6440> of Baasha,<WH1201> king<WH4428> of Israel;<WH3478> Ishmael<WH3458> the son<WH1121> of Nethaniah<WH5418> filled<WH4390> it with the slain.<WH2491>

Then Ishmael<WH3458> took<WH7617> captive<WH7617> all<WH3605> the remnant<WH7611> of the people<WH5971> who<WH834> were in Mizpah,<WH4709> the king's daughters<WH1323> and all<WH3605> the people<WH5971> who were left<WH7604> in Mizpah,<WH4709> whom<WH834> Nebuzaradan<WH5018> the captain<WH9538> of the bodyguard<WH2876> had put<WH6485> under<WH6485> the charge<WH6485> of Gedaliah<WH9072> the son<WH1121> of Ahikam;<WH296> thus Ishmael<WH3458> the son<WH1121> of Nethaniah<WH5418> took<WH7617> them captive<WH7617> and proceeded<WH1980> to cross<WH5674> over<WH5674> to the sons<WH1121> of Ammon.<WH5983>

But Johanan<WH3076> the son<WH1121> of Kareah<WH7143> and all<WH3605> the commanders<WH8269> of the forces<WH2428> that were with him heard<WH8085> of all<WH3605> the evil<WH9567> that Ishmael<WH3458> the son<WH1121> of Nethaniah<WH5418> had done.<WH6213>

So they took<WH3947> all<WH3605> the men<WH376> and went<WH1980> to fight<WH3898> with Ishmael<WH3458> the son<WH1121> of Nethaniah<WH5418> and they found<WH4672> him by the great<WH7227> pool<WH4325> that is in Gibeon.<WH1391>

Now it came<WH1961> about, as soon as all<WH3605> the people<WH5971> who<WH834> were with Ishmael<WH3458> saw<WH7200> Johanan<WH3076> the son<WH1121> of Kareah<WH7143> and the commanders<WH8269> of the forces<WH2428> that were with him, they were glad.<WH8055>

So all<WH3605> the people<WH5971> whom<WH834> Ishmael<WH3458> had taken<WH7617> captive<WH7617> from Mizpah<WH4709> turned<WH5437> around<WH5437> and came<WH7725> back,<WH7725> and went<WH1980> to Johanan<WH3076> the son<WH1121> of Kareah.<WH7143>
But Ishmael<WH3458> the son<WH1121> of Nethaniah<WH5418> escaped<WH4422> from Johanan<WH3076> with eight<WH8083> men<WH376> and went<WH1980> to the sons<WH1121> of Ammon.<WH5983>

Then Johanan<WH3076> the son<WH1121> of Kareah<WH7143> and all<WH3605> the commanders<WH8269> of the forces<WH2428> that were with him took<WH3947> from Mizpah<WH4709> all<WH3605> the remnant<WH7611> of the people<WH5971> whom<WH834> he had recovered<WH7725> from Ishmael<WH3458> the son<WH1121> of Nethaniah,<WH5418> after<WH310> he had struck<WH5221> down<WH5221> Gedaliah<WH1436> the son<WH1121> of Ahikam,<WH296> [that is,] the men<WH376> who were soldiers,<WH582> <WH4421> [the] women,<WH802> [the] children,<WH2945> and [the] eunuchs,<WH5631> whom<WH834> he had brought<WH7725> back<WH7725> from Gibeon.<WH1391>
And they went<WH1980> and stayed<WH3427> in Geruth<WH1628> Chimham,<WH3643> which<WH834> is beside<WH681> Bethlehem,<WH1035> in order to proceed<WH1980> <WH935> into Egypt<WH4714>

because<WH4480> <WH6440> of the Chaldeans;<WH3778> for they were afraid<WH3372> of them, since<WH3588> Ishmael<WH3458> the son<WH1121> of Nethaniah<WH5418> had struck<WH5221> down<WH5221> Gedaliah<WH9072> the son<WH1121> of Ahikam,<WH296> whom<WH834> the king<WH4428> of Babylon<WH894> had appointed<WH6485> over the land.<WH776>
